title: Chúng ta đã hứa
lyrics: Tone chuan Gm.  Capo 3 choi hao ma yi ju hua jiu geng zhu le hou cheng shi dang bei jing de hai shi shen lou wo men xiang fen ge cheng yi zheng ge yu zhou zai jian dou hua zuo wu you wo men shuo hao jue bu fang qi xiang hu qian de shou ke xian shi shuo guang you hai hai bu gou zou dao fen cha de lu kou ni xiang zuo wo xiang you wo men dou jue qiang de bu hui hui tou wo men shuo hao jiu suan fen kai yi yang zuo peng you shi jian shuo wo men cong ci bu ke neng zai wen hou ren qun zhong zai ci xie hou ni bian de na me shou wo hai shi lun xian zai ni de yan mou
